meanings.definition: The act of making something subtle or refined.
meanings.sent1: Her subtilization of the painting brought out its hidden beauty.
meanings.sent2: The subtilization of the flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The subtilization of the joke made it even funnier than before.
meanings.sent4: His subtilization of the melody added a layer of depth to the music.
meanings.sent5: Through subtilization, she transformed the plain dress into an elegant gown.

meanings.definition: The process of making something more intricate or complex.
meanings.sent1: The subtilization of the design made it more interesting to study.
meanings.sent2: With each subtilization of the plan, it became harder to understand.
meanings.sent3: The subtilization of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: His subtilization of the argument added unnecessary complexity.
meanings.sent5: Through subtilization, the project became a maze of details.
